data.name: Disaster Island
data.detailed_description:
By yourself or with friends, try to accomplish various tasks and get out of island! Gather materials, supplies and build necessary structures to survive in extreme conditions. You will have to deal with extreme situations,scenarious and conditions but It's up to you to discover what and who can kill you :)

You set up on adventure for riches. For the only thing that has value in the current world of poverty, and those are NFTs. Try to collect them all and don't let them take a picture of it.

Features

  • Natural Disasters
  • Equipment System
  • Survival mechanism
  • Dynamic weather
  • Multiplayer
  • Various Gamemodes
  • Bugs :)

Gamemodes

  • Survival - Complete various tasks and find ways how to escape.
  • Last man standing - Be the last man to survive.
  • Highscore - Be the last man to survive.

data.short_description: Disaster Island is a unique survival based game, where you have to accomplish missions on abandoned island. But It's not gonna be easy, its not ordinary island. You will be confronted by natural disasters and numerous hidden dangers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD R5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
